hero.title: Welcome Back to Fenny's Lounge & Kitchen
hero.subtitle: After a brief pause, we're thrilled to be back online and better than ever. We've missed you, and we can't wait to serve you the vibrant flavors and unforgettable moments you love.

about.title: The Heart of Fenny's Lounge & Kitchen
about.paragraph1: At Fenny's Lounge & Kitchen, we believe every meal should be a celebration. It's more than just food; it's about crafting an experience where globally-inspired dishes meet local heart. Our chefs pour their passion into every plate, and our mixologists create cocktails that are both art and refreshment.
about.paragraph2: We're incredibly grateful for your support and patience. As we reopen our doors (and our new website!), our commitment is stronger than ever: to be your favorite spot for connection, conversation, and culinary delight. The best moments at Fenny's Lounge & Kitchen are still to come, and we can't wait to share them with you.
